GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
NFSD: Fix potential use-after-free in nfsd_file_put()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 333dcc94ebf53f79f3dc0e7a7c16700bc7ff7e57, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 999397926ab3f78c7d1235cc4ca6e3c89d2769bf. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFSD: Fix potential use-after-free in nfsd_file_put()
OSV.details:
